definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
(bird species of China) mountain scops owl (Otus spilocephalus)

sentences.english: Extend your tongue as far as possible to the corner of your mouth while pressing against a tongue depressor.
sentences.chinese: 向嘴角伸長你的舌頭頂住壓舌器。

sentences.english: He had become very still. Saliva was at the corners of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸已經一動不動了，嘴角上還淌着口水。

sentences.english: The baby drooled at the corners of his mouth.
Blood streams out of  his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 血從他的嘴角流了出來。

sentences.english: It was true. He did have dabs of milk on his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 果然，他的嘴角還留有奶漬。

sentences.english: Her down-turned lips indicated her disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 她嘴角下撇，表示不同意。
向嘴角伸長你的舌頭頂住壓舌器。

sentences.english: mouth corners are pointing in different directions, in a lopsided smile.
sentences.chinese: 嘴角不在同一方向，傾向一方的微笑。

sentences.english: Good humour gleamed in his eyes and lurked in the corners of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 一種幽默感在他的眼中隱約地閃現，也潛伏在嘴角上。

sentences.english: Press your lips together with the corners straight or down.
sentences.chinese: 把嘴脣並在一起，嘴角成一條直線，向下。

sentences.english: The foam in Ron's mouth in one scene is made of egg white.
sentences.chinese: 羅恩在影片中嘴角的白沫其實是用蛋白做出來的。

sentences.english: I middle linger at the vast world , seek mildness being left over in your angulus oris.
sentences.chinese: 我在遼闊的世界中徘徊，尋找殘留在你嘴角的溫柔。

sentences.english: I saw the corners of his eyes and mouth fall.
sentences.chinese: 我看到了他的眼神中的渴盼，嘴角也微微在動。

sentences.english: The ghost of a little smile seemed always to be fading in and out of existence on his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴角總是看上去呈現出若有若無的小小的微笑。

sentences.english: Yi sleet affects a corner of jaws hard ugg claccic also wants apt extrude an silk smile.
sentences.chinese: 伊雪努力的牽動嘴角，還想擠出一絲微笑。

sentences.english: Raise the corners of your lips back and up, please.
sentences.chinese: 請把你的嘴角下揚，上擡。

definition: outer tip of the eyebrow/(facial) expression/(Tw) knack/trick of the trade
outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
to hold in (usually refers the mouth or eyes)
like a smile yet not a smile (idiom)
